General_Description: '''Farming Coin''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Oops, I messed with the wrong people. I'll head north to the peak where the [[Stymphalos Armored Bird|Metal Bird]] overlooks the [[Golden Fields]]. Then, down to the sunken ruins beside [[Stymphalos]] village. There I'll be waiting with my pile of cabbage.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
